ygData.msgSnippet: I am Aban, a level 17 Paladin.  Because I have traveled with companions during my entire life, i never had much chance to quest by myself.  Now that I have a
ygData.messageBody:
I am Aban, a level 17 Paladin. Because I have traveled with companions
during my entire life, i never had much chance to quest by myself. Now
that I have a couple of free days to explore this aspect of paladinhood, I
went to go talk to the Guild masters in the Hall of truth to do the quests
available, they say that im too experienced to do the quests. How do I
get other quests? Will I ever be able to do the test of truth?

thanks in advance for your assistance,

Aban
